Detailed Description

This is the abstract base class for all GUI shaders.

A GUI shader is something that you apply to a GUI component, and it modifies the way in which the component is drawn. It's a kind of filter.

virtual bool GUIShader::load ( DataSectionPtr  pSect  )  [inline, virtual]

bool GUIShader::processComponent ( SimpleGUIComponent &  component,
float  dTime 
) [virtual]

This method processes a GUI component, applying this shader to its vertices.

Parameters:
component The component to process
dTime The delta time for the current frame of the application
Returns:
false To stop processing child components.

Reimplemented in AlphaGUIShader, ClipGUIShader, ColourGUIShader, and MatrixGUIShader.
